newsitem.title: USA: Merrill to pay $30 mln to end Calif. probe.
newsitem.headline: Merrill to pay $30 mln to end Calif. probe.

text.p: Merrill Lynch & Co agreed Thursday to pay $30 million to settle a 2-1/2-year investigation by the Orange County, Calif., district attorney's office into the county's 1994 bankruptcy.
Merrill Lynch also agreed to institute "enhanced procedures for internal coordination" on certain California municipal bond offerings, according to a company statement.
